channel.title: Need help with 2 things
channel.description:
1. Everytime I log off my rights go from 3 to 2 how can I stop it from doing that?
2. How do I get my chat logs to work?

item.title: Need help with 2 things
item.dc:creator: @I_can_3_hit I can 3 hit
item.description:
@I_can_3_hit wrote:

My server has a ::ipban command now can anybody help me get my chat logs working?

Edit: Thanks for your help

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with 2 things
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

lol i dont think there is a ::ipban? if there is got to ur client.java and search for

 /start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

now under this…

/*checkmods(); checkadmins(); checkstaff(); if(checkmods() == 5) playerRights = 1; if(checkadmins() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("blan")) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("pwn you") playerRights = 2; if(checkstaff() == 5 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("blan") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mod friend")) playerRights = 3;*/

add if [code] (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“owner name here”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

			if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("mod name here"))
			{
				playerRights = 1; 
			}

                            if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin name here"))

{
playerRights = 2;
}
[/code]

hope i helped =)

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with 2 things
item.dc:creator: @I_can_3_hit I can 3 hit
item.description:
@I_can_3_hit wrote:

My rights have always been 3 and I never changed I logged on once trying to ::ipban someone and it wouldnt work and I checked my rights and they were 2…

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with 2 things
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

  1. Log off, change it, then log on. Your right were 2 to begin with right? But you changed it while you were logged on, so it resets.

Read full topic
